thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Christina Maria Krysa
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Christina Maria Krysa

author: Christina Maria Krysa
title: Christina Maria Krysa
text: Our agent, Jamie, provided us with excellent service. He put together a custom package that met our specific wants and needs. We decided to go on this trip on short notice yet he was very prompt in providing us with information and getting it all organized for us and all via e-mails. The hotels he booked us in to were fantastic and they were in great locations! Connections to and from the different islands was spot on!! We didn't have any issues or worries!! Someone was always there to greet us and take us to our next destination. I would definitely recommend this company and look forward to future trips thru Goway!!
